intro: Sphaerostigma dentatum, commonly known as the toothed sphaerostigma, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Malvaceae. It is characterized by its distinctive, toothed leaves that are typically arranged alternately along the stems. The plant produces small, clustered flowers that are usually pale yellow or greenish in color. Sphaerostigma dentatum is native to tropical and subtropical regions of Africa and is often found in moist, shaded environments. Its botanical features make it a subject of interest in both horticulture and botanical research.
